data.title: The Settlers: New Allies
data.meta_description: Official Site - The Settlers: New Allies is the new entry in the famous build-up real-time strategy series which combines in-depth economic phases and strategic battles.
data.text:
Access your Digital Content

Discover the Art of The Settlers: New Allies Digital Artbook and Selected Game Soundtrack from the Deluxe Pack & Deluxe Edition.

To access this content you must :

Own either the Deluxe Edition or Standard Edition + Deluxe Pack

Launch the game at least once

Log in to the platform below with the same Ubisoft account you’re playing The Settlers with

If you need support, see here.

ACCESS HERE

The Settlers® History Collection

In celebration of the Settlers iconic series, The Settlers® History Collection is available exclusively on Ubisoft Connect.

The History Collection includes History Editions of all seven previous Settlers games, which includes gold versions of each game with all expansions.

LEARN MORE
